a.n: Jeff Moran & Thomas Carbou live a Quebec

p.k: Jeff Moran & Thomas Carbou live a Quebec 2017. Thomas Carbou & Jeff Moran. Quebec, Canada
p.d: Thomas Carbou and Jeff Moran share an almost telepathic rapport, blending spontaneous improvisation, electronic looping, and Brazilian and Indian musical influences to create ecstatic groove pieces and dream-like soundscapes. They use a wide array of instruments, including a custom-built 8-string guitar, cuatro, bouzouki, caj√≥n, frame drums, berimbau, udu, and metal percussion instruments, as well as samplers and laptops, adding their own hypnotic vocals to the mix.
